content: k2 p2 k2tog ssk p2 k2 p1 pm1r k2 pm1l p1 k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 8 p1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to last 3 sts k2 p1 round 9 *p1 k2 p2 km1r k2 km1l p2 k2 p1 k2tog ssk p1 k2 p2 km1r k2 km1l p2 k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 10 *p1 k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p1 twice k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 11 *p1 k2 p2 k1 km1r k2 km1l k1 p2 k2 k2tog ssk k2 p2 k1 km1r k2 km1l k1 p2 k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 12 *p1 k2 p2 k6 p2 3 times k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 13 *p1 k2 p2 k2 pm1r k2 pm1l k2 p2 k1 k2tog ssk k1 p2 k2 pm1r k2 pm1l k2 p2 k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 14 *p1 k2 p2 k2 p1 twice k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p1 twice k2 p2 k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 15 *p1 k2 p2 k2 p1 pm1r k2 pm1l p1 k2 p2 k2tog ssk p2 k2 p1 pm1r k2 pm1l p1 k2 p2 k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round 2x2 ribbing p1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to last 3 sts k2 p1 repeat 2x2 ribbing until work from beginning measures approximately 10 or when you run out of yarn but have enough to bind off all sts bind off in ribbing loosely copyright © 2003 brenda zuk this pattern is for personal use only and may not be reproduced for commercial purposes do not post this pattern to other internet websites view shopping cart about free links contact blog facebook ravelry copyright © needle beetle all rights reserved file ///users/brendazuk/library/application support/everweb/preview files/a4049766111a49dda2112cd3d4c6c506/freepages/neckwarmer html 211///322
